newsitem.title: JAPAN: TV forecasts of Japan Lower House election result.
newsitem.headline: TV forecasts of Japan Lower House election result.

text.p: The first television exit polls in Japan's general election forecast the following preliminary results as of 6.00 p.m. (0900 GMT) on Sunday.

NOTE - TBS issued a combined figure for projected seats won by the Social Democratic Party and the Sakigake Party. This figure is listed in the "Socialists" tally. There are 500 seats up for election, down from 511 in the outgoing Lower House.
